external_games.name: AURA: Hentai Cards - Horny Madness DLC

name: Aura: Hentai Cards - Horny Madness
summary: In the wastelands of Pentarull there is a town "El Drakio", under the control of Sevilla. Strange things are happening - people are horny! What is going on in the town, and is Sevilla involved? The hero will set out to investigate the strange phenomena of the HORNY MADNESS!
